Data Importer Module¶

The data importer provides the following classes for importing numerical data:

SimpleDataImporter¶

class simpleDataImporter.SimpleDataImporter(i_file_name, i_delimiter=' ')¶

Simple class which import csv data with the numpy function numpy.loadtxt().

get_data()¶

Return the loaded csv data.

Returns:Return a numpy array.
Return type:numpy.array()
read_table(i_file_name, i_delimiter=' ')¶

Read a file.

Parameters:i_file_name (string) – A filename of the file.
